snippet: Though some voters say it may be time after almost 20 years in office for Mayor Thomas M. Menino of Boston to move on, no one is stepping forward to challenge him.
abstract: Boston Mayor Thomas M Menino is longest-serving mayor in city's history, and despite having been hospitalized since Oct 26, no politician has called on him to step aside and no one has emerged as potential challenger; several political analysts say that Menino will probably win if he chooses to run again.
lead_paragraph: Though some voters say it may be time after almost 20 years in office for Mayor Thomas M. Menino of Boston to move on, no one is stepping forward to challenge him.

headline.seo: Menino, Boston’s Ailing Mayor, Says He’s Up to Job
headline.main: Ailing Mayor of Boston Says He’s Still Up to the Job
headline.print_headline: Ailing Mayor Of Boston Says He’s Still Up to the Job
